summary: This is an FBI email regarding a scheduled meeting titled 'CID Case Updates Meeting for SCs and UCs'. The email is unclassified and includes meeting logistics such as date, time, and location. It appears to be internal FBI coordination related to case updates.

events.title: CID Case Updates Meeting for SCs and UCs
events.description: A meeting scheduled to provide case updates for SCs (possibly Special Counsel or Supervisory Counsel) and UCs (possibly Undercover agents or Unit Chiefs).

keyFacts: The email is an FBI internal communication dated November 19, 2018.
It announces a 'CID Case Updates Meeting for SCs and UCs', indicating ongoing investigative activity.
The meeting was to be held in the CID Large Conference Room 3853.
The document is classified as UNCLASSIFIED.
The subject line suggests coordination between different FBI roles (SCs and UCs) regarding case updates.
